Footer.slogan: Your outpatient care service in Berlin

Hero.title: WE CARE WITH HEART AND MIND

AboutTeaser.title: DFM - Your outpatient care service in Berlin Reinickendorf & Mitte
AboutTeaser.text: We are an outpatient care service that has made it its mission to care for, support and assist people in their familiar surroundings. Our goal is to maintain and improve the quality of life of our patients.

basicCare.title: Basic Care
basicCare.text: Basic care includes support with daily personal hygiene, nutrition and mobility.

treatmentCare.title: Treatment Care
treatmentCare.text: Treatment care is prescribed by a doctor and includes medical services such as wound care or medication administration.

housekeeping.title: Housekeeping
housekeeping.text: We support you with housekeeping, e.g. shopping, cooking or cleaning the apartment.

respiteCare.title: Respite Care
respiteCare.text: If caring relatives are unavailable, we take over the care and support.

supportServices.title: Support Services
supportServices.text: We offer individual support and activation to promote mental and physical fitness.

consultation.title: Consultation Visits
consultation.text: We advise you and your relatives on all questions relating to care.

DayCareTeaser.title: DFM Day Care in Berlin Reinickendorf
DayCareTeaser.text: In our day care in Berlin Reinickendorf, we offer you professional care and support in a family atmosphere. We attach great importance to individual and activating care that is tailored to the needs and wishes of our guests.

CareerTeaser.title: Career at DFM
CareerTeaser.text: We are always looking for qualified and dedicated employees to strengthen our team. If you have a passion for care and enjoy working in a dynamic and friendly environment, then you have come to the right place.
